SEARCH
Package user

Class User

java.lang.Object
user.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Person, Restaurant
public abstract class User extends Object
The User class represents a user in the MyFoodora system. It provides methods for managing user information and ensuring unique usernames.
Author:
Aymane Adib

      public User(String name, String username, String password) throws BadUserCreationException

      name - the name of the user
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Throws:
      BadUserCreationException - if there is an error creating the user

      Constructor for the User class with only a password. This constructor is used when the name and username are not provided.

  • Method Details

    • addUsernameToUsernamesUsed

      public static void addUsernameToUsernamesUsed(String username)
      Adds the given username to the static collection of usernames already in use.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to be added to the set of used usernames.

    • removeUsernameFromUsernamesUsed

      public static void removeUsernameFromUsernamesUsed(String username)
      Removes the given username from the static collection of usernames already in use.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to be removed from the set of used usernames.

    • clearUsernamesFromUsernamesUsed

      public static void clearUsernamesFromUsernamesUsed()
      Removes all usernames from the static collection of usernames already in use.
